text: 'awalam yasir hwla' almukadhibun biallah alghafilun ean alakhirat fi al'ard sayr tamal waetbar, fyshahdu kayf kan jaza'an al'umam aladhin kdhdhabu birusul allah kead wthmwd? waqad kanuu 'aqwaa minhum ajsamana, wa'aqdir ealaa altmte bialhayat hayth hrthu al'ard wzrewha, wbnawa alqusur wsknwha, feamaru dnyahm 'akthar mimaa eamar 'ahl "mk" dnyahm, falam tanfaeuhum eimarthm wala tul mdthm, waja'athum rusuluhum balhjj alzzahirat walbrahyn alsatet, fkdhdhabwhm fahlkhm allh, walam yzlmhm allah bdhlk al'ihlak, wa'iinama zalamuu 'anfusahum balshrk walesyan
